code: import SiteMemberActionTypes from'./site-member.types';export var handleMemberSignout=function handleMemberSignout(){return{type:SiteMemberActionTypes.HANDLE_MEMBER_SIGN_OUT};};export var registrationStart=function registrationStart(userRegistrationInfo){return{type:SiteMemberActionTypes.REGISTER_START,payload:userRegistrationInfo};};export var registrationSuccess=function registrationSuccess(user){return{type:SiteMemberActionTypes.REGISTER_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var registrationFailure=function registrationFailure(error){return{type:SiteMemberActionTypes.REGISTER_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var signInStart=function signInStart(emailAndPassword){return{type:SiteMemberActionTypes.SIGN_IN_START,payload:emailAndPassword};};export var signInSuccess=function signInSuccess(user){return{type:SiteMemberActionTypes.SIGN_IN_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var signInFailure=function signInFailure(error){return{type:SiteMemberActionTypes.SIGN_IN_FAILURE,payload:error};};
